name: The Luddite's Tale
description:
Controls: AD for left-right movement, Mouse1 and Mouse2 do attacks and where you aim your mouse will determine the type of attack. 

Time: About five minutes give or take.

This game was made for the N8Jam by me and my team Valis Systems in a week. It is about an executioner's first day on the job after a Luddite Revolution. I can certainly say I learnt alot in this jam, as it was the first game I have ever properly used physics, and overall I'm happy with what we made, but time constraints certainly had an impact on the final product resulting in things such as all the Audio I wanted not being able to be added. Perhaps I will add them later if the response to the game is positive enough. Huge thanks to the hosts of the N8Jam for setting the whole thing up, with an extra thanks to Manisha for sending me a Copy-Pastable text of the lore so I didn't have to write it out myself.
